name: In a Coma
description:
In a Coma is a game I made for the Brackeys game jam 2022 with Rust and macroquad.

Bill has fallen into a coma, help him to wakeup from his dream state.

don't touch the lost souls!

this is my 1st game written in Rust and I sure did learn a lot about Rust from it.

Controls:

WASD to move

reach the Red Door to complete the game,
